body.name: Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth, Wielio Native 1080P 15000L Outdoor Portable Mini Video Movie Projector, Proyector Compatible with iOS/Android/TV Stick/HDMI/USB/AV for Home Theater
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 57 mins
features: 【Newest Wifi and Bluetooth Projector】 Users can use wifi, bluetooth, HDMI cable, or other cables for wireless or wired projection. Wifi or wired connection can be use for projection and pictures or videos. The projector has inner stereo speakers, but if you pursue for better sound effect, you can connect earphone or speaker to the projector though bluetooth.

【Native 1080P Full HD Resolution】: The projector is an excellent device that allows you to watch HD movies, with 1920*1080 native resolution, excellent 12000L brightness, and 10000:1 high dynamic contrast ratio, Our projectors can be used with 200" screens for brighter, richer images! Enjoy an immersive cinematic experience in the comfort of your own home Clearer

【Enhanced audio performance】: Immerse yourself in crystal clear sound with the built-in 15W speaker. Experience enhanced audio quality and enjoy your favorite movies, music and games in rich, immersive sound!

【Multiple Devices Compatible Projector 】Our portable movie projector is fit for watch videos, photo sharing, football matches, play games, etc. It can be perfectly connected with TV Stick, iphone, android phone, Tablet, Laptop, audio, PC, USB Flash Disk, PS4, Gaming Consoles, etc. (Please note that due to copyright issue, you may need to use an HDMI cable to connect your laptop for screen mirroring services like Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime, and others.)

【Dedicated customer support】: We are committed to providing excellent customer service. Our knowledgeable and friendly support team is ready to help you with any questions or concerns you may have. We offer reliable after-sales service to give you peace of mind.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 5.0 5.0 out of 5 stars 30 ratings 5.0 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Such a cool little projector!! So small, great picture. What more could you ask for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The WIFI and Bluetooth functions of this 4K projector are excellent, allowing me to easily connect with various devices, whether it is a mobile phone, computer or tablet, the connection can be established quickly and it is very convenient to use.During use, I found that the picture quality of this projector is very clear and the color reproduction is also very high. Especially when playing 4K videos, the picture effect is stunning. At the same time, it is bright enough to present a clear and bright picture even in low-light environments. This makes for a very satisfying home viewing experience.In addition to the hardware advantages, the operating system of this projector is also very user-friendly. Its interface design is simple and clear, and it is very convenient to operate. Moreover, it also has built-in some commonly used applications, such as video players, browsers, etc., which are very smooth to use without any lag. This makes me feel that it is more than just a projector, but more like a smart home device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better Movie Nights
reviews.reviewText: This projector is easy to set up. I have this little nook in my living room, right under a big, fluffy blanket, where I set it up. The image quality is pretty impressive. It's like having a mini cinema at home. And the Bluetooth feature is a nifty addition - I connected my portable speaker for that extra oomph in sound quality. Makes a world of difference, trust me. There was this one time when I had friends over for a movie marathon. We were all snuggled up, popcorn in hand, and the projector just brought everything to life. It felt like we were in our own private theater. The laugh riots and gasps during the thriller - all amplified by the crisp and clear visuals. The remote control could be more responsive. Sometimes I have to press a button twice to get it to work. Not a deal-breaker, but worth mentioning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This projector caters to all needs.
reviews.reviewText: The seamless wireless screen mirroring of iOS and Android devices via WiFi has made movie nights and presentations a breeze. With a native resolution of 1920*1080 and an impressive 18000L brightness, the visuals are nothing short of breathtaking, offering exceptional clarity and detail that truly transforms any space into a captivating theater experience.The ±15-degree keystone correction ensures that any distortion caused by uneven surfaces is easily corrected, resulting in a perfect rectangular image every time. With built-in HDMI, USB, AV, TF, VGA, and 3.5mm headphone interfaces, connecting various devices like iPhone, Android, and Windows systems is a breeze. Whether it's a TV stick, phone, laptop, USB stick, or even PS5, this projector caters to all needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect companion for my home entertainment! The brightness ensures a clear and vivid display. The color reproduction is excellent, making movies and games livelier and more immersive. It's easy to install, space-saving, and aesthetically pleasing. The appearance is super stylish, designed with great human usability, and comes with comprehensive functionality. I love its smart features, and it's equipped with various interfaces, making it easy to connect to different devices, which is very convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I decided to switch things up in my bedroom for movie nights. Instead of the usual TV glare, I now have this neat projector, all snug and pretty, adding a whole new vibe. What I really adore is its tiny tripod – such a cute little thing but so practical! I can easily tweak it to get the perfect angle for my movie marathons. Finding that sweet spot on the wall for projection is easy with it. I pair it with my phone and when the movie starts, the brightness is just right – soft and gentle, so no squinty eyes or headaches here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have used this projector for more than half a month, and overall, it meets my expectations! It is small, true to size, which is what I wanted. The instructions were clear, it was very easy to set it up, and it had no problem connecting it with my phone and laptop. The projection quality is great and very clear, and the sound quality is better than I expected, no need to use a speaker. Overall, the description is accurate and works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and Clear
reviews.reviewText: This projector is small. which makes it super easy to move around, and the Bluetooth connectivity works well. I've been linking it to my phone to project shows on the wall while I work. The picture quality is sharp, and adjusting the settings is straightforward. What I really like is how bright the display is; everything is clear as day. Also, it runs quietly, which is a relief because who needs extra noise? The sound quality is just okay, nothing to write home about, but it does the job. Overall, it's a solid choice that fits my needs just right.
